attributes.action: stop making the drivers over 70 renew thire  licence and give them a licence for life
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: older drivers are better than we are and it is not right that they should renew thire licence just becouse they are 70 if you have passed your test you should have have a licence for life most old people will not drive if thire are not able to

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
